item.description:
Special Invitation for DWC members & friends 

 Are you ready to find your voice, expand your market and own your space?

 Then join me in Boston on Oct. 20-22 at 

The Diva Toolbox 2011 Conference
for Women in Business.

 I would personally like to invite DWC members at the Sheraton Colonial Golf Resort  (12 miles north of Boston in Wakefield) on October 20-22, 2011 for a one of a kind conference as a VIP DIVA!  

 ***REGISTRATION CLOSES ON MONDAY, OCTOBER 17, only 50 seats left!

 Spend three days with fellow Diva women in business and learn new ways to grow, price, sell, market and measure your business! You will leave the conference with more than 250 new friends and followers on social media as well as have a toolbox FULL of the information you need to succeed!

 Register TODAY and use coupon code NOONA to identify you as one of the DWC Guests and you get -$50 of $497 for this 3-day conference. You can SHARE the ticket with a friend if you cannot attend all 3 days 

 There are limited spots available so please register today for over $3,500 in additional benefits:

  • Monthly private 60 minute group session with Janet for 3 months ($750 value)
  • Special VIP seating at one of the Keynote sessions ($250 value)
  • Promote your business with a Video Commercial on Conference Website ($250 value)
  • Add a promotional item to the Diva Toolbox Tote Bag ($250 value)
  • Peter Shankman's Book on  Customer Service: New Rules for a Social-Enabled World ($12 value)
  • Mike Michalowicz' Book The Toilet Paper Entrepreneur ($24 value)
  • Chance to win a backstage tour of MSNBC with Mike Michalowicz (Priceless)
  • One year listing on launchmoxie.com ($197 value)
  • How to Maximize Your Business on Facebook Special Audio & Video Series ($97 value)
  • 12 Social Media Posts about your business and brand posted on Diva Toolbox social media accounts ($1,200 value)
  • NEW - Your Business Video Commercial promoted on the Diva Toolbox Website until 12/31/2011. ($197 value)
    • We will have someone to record your video for you at the Conference so you don't have to worry about a thing - once again we will do it for you! ($300 value)
    • You will be able to reuse your video on your own site and for your own promotion after the Conference too!

 

 Register TODAY and use coupon code NOONA to identify you as a DWC Guests and receive -$50.

 More info at:http://divatoolbox.net/meet-mike-michalowicz-live-at-the-diva-toolbox-2011-conference-for-women/

 Hope to see you there!

group.name: New England Network for Women :: Cambridge

item.name: Diva Toolbox Conference
